record.description: Photograph taken in Chengdu, Sichuan province, China April 12, 1909 in the yámen of the Provincial Treasurer during a visit by Mr. Ernest De Witt Burton and Mr. Thomas C. Chamberlin, members of the Oriental Educational Commission of the University of Chicago. The seven Chinese officials are: The Literary Chancellor, Provincial Treasurer, (host), Commissioner of Education, his deputy, Head of the Foreign Office, Head of the Industrial Department, and Head of the Police Department. Second row: Mr. Davidson, English Quaker Missionary (second left), Rollin T. Chamberlin, University of Chicago (fourth left), Rev. Joseph Beach, American Methodist Missionary (sixth left), Dr. Henry T. Hodgkin (ninth left); and Y. T. Yang, interpreter (tenth left). First row: Thomas C. Chamberlin (second left), Ernest De Witt Burton (fourth left).
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Letter mounted on back-attached to board.
